entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:19 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:19 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
